response.overview: This is a VHS Murder Mystery game where the players try to solve the case of who killed Tyler Dudden.  The game contains a 30 minute video and 8 cards. At intervals in the video you pause and read out one side of the numbered cards. At the end of the game the players review the clues and try to solve the crime.  There is a booklet with the solutions to all the possible combinations.
response.title: Agatha Christie: Behind the Screen
